SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA AS TABLE_CAT, ? AS TABLE_SCHEM, TABLE_NAME, CASE WHEN TABLE_TYPE=? THEN CASE WHEN TABLE_SCHEMA = ? OR TABLE_SCHEMA = ? THEN ? ELSE ? END WHEN TABLE_TYPE=? THEN ? ELSE TABLE_TYPE END AS TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_COMMENT AS REMARKS, ? AS TYPE_CAT, ? AS TYPE_SCHEM, ? AS TYPE_NAME, ? AS SELF_REFERENCING_COL_NAME, ? AS REF_GENERATION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ? AND TABLE_NAME LIKE ? HAVING TABLE_TYPE IN (?,?,?,?,?) ORDER BY TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME

SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, ?, TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME,CASE  WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN CASE WHEN LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, COLUMN_TYPE) != ? THEN ? ELSE ? END  WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN CASE WHEN LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, COLUMN_TYPE) != ? THEN ? ELSE ? END  WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? ELSE ? END  AS DATA_TYPE, UPPER(CASE WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN CASE WHEN LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, COLUMN_TYPE) != ? THEN ? WHEN LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) != ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(DATA_TYPE)) = ? THEN ? ELSE DATA_TYPE END  WHEN LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) != ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(DATA_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(DATA_TYPE)) <> ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(DATA_TYPE)) <> ? THEN CONCAT(DATA_TYPE, ?) WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? ELSE UPPER(DATA_TYPE) END) AS TYPE_NAME,UPPER(CASE WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=?  THEN ?+(CASE WHEN DATETIME_PRECISION>? THEN DATETIME_PRECISION+? ELSE DATETIME_PRECISION END) WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? OR  UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=?  THEN ?+(CASE WHEN DATETIME_PRECISION>? THEN DATETIME_PRECISION+? ELSE DATETIME_PRECISION END) WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) = ? AND LOCATE(?, COLUMN_TYPE) != ? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? AND LOCATE(?, UPPER(COLUMN_TYPE)) != ? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN ? WHEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH IS ? THEN NUMERIC_PRECISION WHEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH > ? THEN ? ELSE CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH END) AS COLUMN_SIZE,? AS BUFFER_LENGTH,UPPER(CASE WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN NUMERIC_SCALE WHEN UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? OR UPPER(DATA_TYPE)=? THEN CASE WHEN NUMERIC_SCALE IS ? THEN ? ELSE NUMERIC_SCALE END ELSE ? END) AS DECIMAL_DIGITS,? AS NUM_PREC_RADIX,CASE WHEN IS_NULLABLE=? THEN ? ELSE CASE WHEN IS_NULLABLE=? THEN ? ELSE ? END END AS NULLABLE,COLUMN_COMMENT AS REMARKS,COLUMN_DEFAULT AS COLUMN_DEF,? AS SQL_DATA_TYPE,? AS SQL_DATETIME_SUB,CASE WHEN CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH > ? THEN ? ELSE CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH END AS CHAR_OCTET_LENGTH,ORDINAL_POSITION, IS_NULLABLE, ? AS SCOPE_CATALOG, ? AS SCOPE_SCHEMA, ? AS SCOPE_TABLE, ? AS SOURCE_DATA_TYPE,IF (EXTRA LIKE ?,?,?) AS IS_AUTOINCREMENT, IF (EXTRA LIKE ?,?,?) AS IS_GENERATEDCOLUMN FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ? AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE ? ORDER BY TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION
insert into Courses (courseName, courseRate, courseId) values (?, ?, ?)
select next_val as id_val from course_seq for update
update course_seq set next_val= ? where next_val=?
